title: Donald Trump Sharpie Altered Dorian Map Statement – Hurricane Dorian Update Transcript

content.text: We thought we'd give you an update on the hurricane. We got lucky in Florida. Very, very lucky indeed. We had actually, our original chart, was that it was going to be hitting Florida directly. Maybe I could just see that, Kevin. It was going to be hitting directly and that would have affected a lot of other states, but that was the original chart, and you see it was going to hit not only Florida, but Georgia, could have... Was going toward the Gulf.
